original_text: 天青色等煙雨，而我在等妳  The sky is blue enough to expect the rain; For you I am waiting, however in vain.   炊煙裊裊昇起，隔江千萬里  The chimney smoke is to rise; across the river lies thousands of miles.  (這也是李杜老師翻的.原文太長.只能節錄)
